name: Blood Flurry
movement: 15 ft. walking speed, 40 ft. flying speed
description: The Blood Flurry resembles a swirling collection of snowflakes when motionless, characterized by its ability to fly swiftly.
memorable: Its unique ability to cause bleeding wounds that persist over time makes encounters particularly dangerous.
goals: Typically hunts for blood to sustain its diet and maintain its camouflage.
relations: Might be encountered with other aberrations or in locations with a dark magic influence.
environment: Often found in cold, remote areas where it can lurk unnoticed.
strengths: Highly mobile with a fast flying speed and resistant to multiple damage types.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to rust-related effects due to a diet heavy in iron.
attacks: Utilizes two attacks called Free Bleeding Cuts that can cause persistent damage if the target fails a saving throw.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to inflict bleeding wounds that cause ongoing damage to non-undead targets.
senses: Possesses Blood Sense, allowing it to detect creatures by scent within 30 feet.
skills: Has a passive perception of 11, which is low for its CR.
additional_information: Can blend in as a harmless collection of snowflakes while motionless.
Cannot regain hit points while occupying another creature's space.
Inflicts additional ongoing damage if targets do not staunch their wounds.
Immune to conditions such as charmed and frightened.
Possesses significant Dexterity which aids in avoiding incoming attacks.
